content.description: Throws a bouncing projectile. Explodes, sometimes.

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Very rarely appears after unlocking **Yatta Cavallo**

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Area +25%, Speed +30% 
(3) 50% to Explode 
(4) Fires 1 more projectile 
(5) Area +25%, Damage +5 
(6) 60% to Explode 
(7) Area +25%, Speed +30% 
(8) Area +25%, Damage +5

content.title: Cherry Bomb
